thread.title: Weather: Sunny skies with warmer temperatures today
thread.title_full: Weather: Sunny skies with warmer temperatures today | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: Weather: Sunny skies with warmer temperatures today
text:
Skies will be clear and temperatures should be a bit warmer today wtih a high of 67, according to the National Weather Service. The low tonight will be about 52.
The high pressure causing the lowering temperatures, however, is starting to wane and will allow temperatures to crawl back up to the low 70s on Wednesday and to the mid-70s by Thursday.
High temperatures will be back in the 60s for Friday and Saturday.
